content: the piper headband is constructed all in one this includes the ties meaning you will not have to fasten_off and reattach your yarn during this project until the very end the piper headband begins with the creation of a long spiral tie followed by the body of the headband and then ending with the second tie this pattern can be made with any yarn weight 2-4 and is also made to measure meaning you can adjust the size as needed because of this there is no specific gauge materials needed 40-45 grams of any yarn ranging from sport weight 2 to light worsted 4 4mm- 6mm hook depending on yarn type measuring tape tapestry needle scissors
